title: Understanding Relationships in Databases
text: In database design, relationships are used to connect tables and define how data in one table relates to data in another. Managing these relationships is crucial for maintaining data integrity.

title: Where to Find Relationship Management
text: To manage relationships in a database, you typically need to access a specific tool or option within the database design interface. This is often found under the 'Design' or 'Relationships' menu.

title: Navigating the Design Menu
text: Look for an option that allows you to manage relationships within the design menu. This option is usually labeled clearly to indicate its function.
